sentences: Gregg Rudloff (November 2, 1955 â€“ January 6, 2019) was an American re-recording mixer.
He worked on 150 films from 1983 onwards.
His father, Tex Rudloff, was a sound engineer who was nominated for an Academy Award in 1978.
On January 6, 2019, Rudloff died at the age of 63 from a reported suicide.
